mapper.update: update order_detail set orderid = #{orderid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, productid = #{productid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, productname = #{productname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, productprice = #{productprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, productquantity = #{productquantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, producticon = #{producticon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updatetime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where detailid = #{detailid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select detailid, orderid, productid, productname, productprice, productquantity, producticon, createtime, updatetime from order_detail where detailid = #{detailid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select detailid, orderid, productid, productname, productprice, productquantity, producticon, createtime, updatetime from order_detail
